response:
reasoning="The folded-cascode OTA requires a differential pair, cascode transistors, and biasing. Key steps:
1. Header/Footer comments preserved verbatim
2. Subcircuit 'fc_ota' with exactly 6 pins including ibn10u
3. All PMOS use tsmc18dP, NMOS use tsmc18dN
4. Explicit port usage (vin/vip/vout) in transistor connections
5. Testbench instance I1 matches template format
6. Strict adherence to netlist structure:
   - No leading dots on subckt/ends
   - No extra text outside required sections
7. Bias current mirroring via ibn10u port
8. Folded-cascode topology with NMOS input pair and PMOS cascode devices
9. Sizing focused on meeting gain, bandwidth, and current constraints" config=ConfigFile(netlist='// Library name: MP4
// Cell name: fc_ota
// View name: schematic
subckt fc_ota VDD VSS ibn10u vin vip vout
    N0 (net8 ibn10u VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=4.5u l=350n
    N1 (net1 vip net8 VSS) tsmc18dN w=15u l=180n
    N2 (net2 vin net8 VSS) tsmc18dN w=15u l=180n
    P0 (net1 net3 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=24u l=180n
    P1 (net2 net3 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=24u l=180n
    P2 (net3 net3 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=6u l=500n
    N3 (vout net4 net1 VSS) tsmc18dN w=18u l=180n
    N4 (vout net4 net2 VSS) tsmc18dN w=18u l=180n
    N5 (net4 net4 VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=3u l=500n
    P3 (net5 net3 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=12u l=180n
    P4 (vout net5 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=36u l=180n
ends fc_ota
// Top-level instantiation
// Library name: MP4
// Cell name: dut
// View name: schematic
I1 (net1 net2 net5 net3 net4 net6) fc_ota')
